item.title: FTX’s Gary Wang Gets No Prison Time
item.description:
According to multiple reports, U.S. District Judge Lewis Kaplan sentenced Wang to time served, three years of supervised release, and has been ordered to forfeit illicit funds obtained as part of the scheme. Wang was responsible for writing the actual code that executed illicit transactions of FTX customer funds.
